import React,{useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const AddUser = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [gender, setGender] = useState("Pria"); const saveUser = async (e) =>{ e.prevent } return (
setName(e.target.value)} placeholder='Name'/>
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder='Email'/>
) } export default AddUser
